# Florin - Product Engineer & Indie Hacker

## Profile
High-velocity builder focused on AI, SaaS infrastructure, and Productivity tools. 
Location: Iasi, Romania / Remote.
Availability: Open for high-impact collaborations and indie-hacking ventures.

## Core Projects
- Paje.ai: AI-driven page optimization.
- Deeproductivity: High-performance focus tools.
- MarketRoute: GTM strategy automation.
- UIforSaaS: Design systems for developers.
- Louis Purple Iasi: Specialized retail digital transformation.

## Technical Stack
React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, PostgreSQL, OpenAI API, Codex, Claude Code, Cursor, V0.
